value.title: Zipper Merging Is A Frenzied Traffic Squeeze Play On Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Zipper merging, whereby cars are shunted into a 2-into-1 lane narrowing, can be especially tough on self-driving cars.

value.title: Velodyne aims to price new self-driving car sensor below $500
value.excerpt: Velodyne Lidar Inc said on Friday it would introduce a new lidar unit, a key sensor in self-driving cars, with a target price point of less than $500 and no moving parts.

value.title: Join the Final Lap of the 2020 DeepRacer League at AWS re:Invent 2020
value.excerpt: AWS DeepRacer is the fastest way to get rolling with machine learning (ML). It’s a fully autonomous 1/18th scale race car driven by reinforcement learning, a 3D racing simulator, and a global racing league. value.title: Walmart and Cruise launch pilot to deliver orders via self-driving cars

value.title: Neural’s market outlook for artificial intelligence in 2021 and beyond
value.excerpt: The year is coming to a close and it’s safe to say Elon Musk’s prediction that his company would field one million “robotaxis” by the end of 2020 isn’t going to come true. In fact, so far, Tesla’s managed to produce exactly zero self-driving vehicles.
